questionTitle: Which of the following service creates an application hosting environment?
questionExplanation: AppFabric is a cloud-enabled version of the .NET Framework.

questionOption1: Microsoft’s approach is to view cloud applications as software plus service
questionOption2: Microsoft calls their cloud operating system the Windows Platform
questionOption3: Azure is a combination of virtualized infrastructure to which the .NET Framework has been added as a set of .NET Services
questionExplanation: In SaaS model, the cloud is another platform and applications can run locally and access cloud services or run entirely in the cloud and be accessed by browsers using standard Service Oriented Architecture (SOA) protocols.

questionTitle: Which of the following is also known as Compute?
questionExplanation: Azure and its related services were built to allow developers to extend their applications into the cloud.

questionTitle: Database marketplace based on SQL Azure Database is code-named ________
questionExplanation: Azure is a virtualized infrastructure to which a set of additional enterprise services has been layered on top.

questionOption1: The Windows Azure service itself is a hosted environment of virtual machines enabled by a fabric called Windows Azure ApplicationFab
questionOption2: Windows Azure service is a Compliance as a Service offering
questionOption3: Windows Live Services is a collection of applications and services that run on the Web
questionExplanation: Some of these applications called Windows Live Essentials are add-ons to Windows and downloadable as applications.

questionTitle: ________ Live Services can be used in applications that run in the Azure cloud.
questionExplanation: Windows Live Services is a collection of services that runs on Windows Live.

questionTitle: Which of the following is based on Microsoft Dynamics?
questionExplanation: Dynamics CRM is an xRM (Anything Relations Management) service.

questionTitle: Which of the following is based on Microsoft Sharepoint?
questionExplanation: A document and collaboration service based on SharePoint is called SharePoint Service.

questionTitle: Azure is Microsoft’s ___________ as a Service Web hosting service.
questionExplanation: Windows Azure Platform is a competitor to Google’s App Engine.

questionTitle: Which of the following is a pure infrastructure play?
questionExplanation: Microsoft has a very different vision for cloud services than either Amazon or Google does.
